Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: After raising their voices with the Butler War Song, the fight went out of the Hinkle crowd as Connecticut closed out a 53-41 victory for the national title.
snippet: After raising their voices with the Butler War Song, the fight went out of the Hinkle crowd as Connecticut closed out a 53-41 victory for the national title.
